summary.span: 获取联合项的属性扩展。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联合对象模型允许您将自定义属性添加到 实例中。The Syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a instance. 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，会将自定义属性写入 `` 元素中。When serialized for Atom 1.0, the custom attribute is written to an `` element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时，会将自定义属性写入 `` 元素中。When serialized for RSS 2.0, the custom attribute is written to an `` element. 有关演示如何添加属性扩展的完整示例，请参阅[Loosely-Typed 扩展](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)示例。For a complete example that shows how to add an attribute extension, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下面的代码说明如何向联合源添加属性扩展。The following code shows how to add an attribute extension to a syndication feed. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/snippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/snippets.vb#3)] 下面的 XML 代码演示如何将具有自定义属性 的 `itemAttrib` 实例序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML code shows an Atom 1.0 serialization of a instance with a custom attribute called `itemAttrib`. [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#4](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/atom.xml#4)] 下面的代码演示如何将相同的 实例序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following code shows the same instance serialized as RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#5](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/rss.xml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是所有联合内容类型的基类。 is a base class for all syndication content types. [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] 定义了下列联合内容类型：The [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] defines the following syndication content types: - - - 您可以将此属性分配给上述任一内容类型（也可以分配给从 派生的用户定义类型）。You can assign this property to any of these content types (or possibly a user-defined type derived from ). 若为 Atom 1.0， 属性会序列化为 `` 元素。For Atom 1.0, the property is serialized to a `` element. 若为 RSS 2.0， 属性会序列化为 `` 的 元素，以及 `` 和 的 元素。For RSS 2.0, the property is serialized to a `` element for , a `` element for and . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将内容添加到 。The following code shows how to add content to a . [!code-csharp[SyndicationItem#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/cs/program.cs#24)] [!code-vb[SyndicationItem#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/vb/snippets.vb#24)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized for Atom 1.0. 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some content ``` 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some text ``` 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized for RSS 2.0. 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some content ``` 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 的序列化方式如下面的示例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some text ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElementExtensions As SyndicationElementExtensionCollection

summary.span: 获取联合项中包含的元素扩展。

span.span: Gets the element extensions contained in the syndication item.
A that contains the element extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。Any valid XML element can be added as an extension provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 序列化后，扩展的写入形式与任何其他 XML 元素类似。When serialized, extensions are written like any other XML element. ``` ``` 有关演示如何添加元素扩展的完整示例，请参阅[Loosely-Typed 扩展](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)示例。For a complete example that shows how to add element extensions, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将元素扩展添加到 实例。The following code shows how to add element extensions to a instance. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/snippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/snippets.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter GetRss20Formatter(bool serializeExtensionsAsAtom) cil managed
Public Function GetRss20Formatter (serializeExtensionsAsAtom As Boolean) As Rss20ItemFormatter

param.name: serializeExtensionsAsAtom
param.span: 一个指定是否使用 Atom 1.0 命名空间序列化元素和属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize element and attribute extensions with an Atom 1.0 namespace.

summary.span: 获取一个 实例。

span.span: Gets an instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RSS 2.0 允许使用未在其规范中的元素和属性，但前提是这些元素和属性必须在命名空间中。RSS 2.0 allows elements and attributes that are not in its specification only if they are within a namespace. 如果 `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` 参数为 `true`，则格式化程序会自动将“a10”命名空间添加到所有扩展中；否则，不会序列化扩展。When the `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, the formatter automatically adds the "a10" namespace to all extensions; otherwise, the extensions are not serialized. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将 RSS 2.0 格式的联合项写入 XML 文件，同时序列化属性和元素扩展。The following code shows how to write a syndication item in RSS 2.0 format to an XML file, serializing attribute and element extensions. [!code-csharp[SyndicationItem#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/cs/program.cs#44)] [!code-vb[SyndicationItem#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/vb/snippets.vb#44)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryParseAttribute (string name, string ns, string value, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryParseAttribute(string name, string ns, string value, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function TryParseAttribute (name As String, ns As String, value As String, version As String) As Boolean
protected public: virtual bool TryParseAttribute(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ value, System::String ^ version);
abstract member TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool override this.TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在分析时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use when parsing.

summary.span: 试图分析属性扩展。

span.span: Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 一个指定是否已成功分析属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 若为 Atom 1.0，这些扩展会序列化为 `` 元素的属性。若为 RSS 1.0，这些扩展会序列化为 `` 元素的属性。这取决于使用的联合版本。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` (for Atom 1.0) or `` (for RSS 1.0) element, depending upon the syndication version being used. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 读取过程中遇到无效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的元素扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
